properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
MASSACHUSETTS.
DNC 18.
90 FOOT F/V HARMONY, SIX PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO LOSS OF STEERING
IN 42-09.2N 068-45.2W AT 240240Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO USCG SECTOR NEW ENGLAND,
PHONE: 508 457 3211.
